newsitem.title: USA: US Boxed Beef Daily Totals, 5-Day Avg - 8/19 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: US Boxed Beef Daily Totals, 5-Day Avg - 8/19 - USDA.

text.p: Based on FOB Omaha basis carlot prices of fabricated beef cuts and on industry yields as of 3:00 PM -- USDA
Fab Trm CH 1-3 CH 1-3 SE 1-3 SE 1-3
REPORTED BOXED CARCASS TOTAL FOR THE WEEK:
08-15-97- 1,970 head of Select and Choice 1-3 boxed carcass.
08-08-97- 2,078 head of Select and Choice 1-3 boxed carcass.
08-01-97- 2,052 head of Select and Choice 1-3 boxed carcass.
07-25-97- 1,844 head of Select and Choice 1-3 boxed carcass.
07-18-97- 2,150 head of Select and Choice 1-3 boxed carcass.
07-11-97- 2,798 head of Select and Choice 1-3 boxed carcass.
